title: Food quality is not good
description: Meals were cold and lacked proper seasoning. Buffet section was poorly maintained.

title: Staff behavior is not good
description: Reception staff was rude during check-in and did not provide proper guidance.

title: Electricity very bad
description: Frequent power cuts during the night. Backup generator took too long to start.

title: WiFi not working properly
description: Internet connection keeps disconnecting and speed is too slow for video calls.

title: Room was not clean
description: Bedsheets were stained, floor was dusty, and bathroom was not hygienic.
